I'm a Product Design Intern at Brewbot and a student of Interactive Design at the University of Ulster. If you fancy a chat, you can email me at aaron@aarongilmore.com or tweet me @aarondgilmore.

Work

Product Design Intern

2013 - 2014

View Project

Brewbot uses sensor technology to track and automate the brewing process. Simply follow the instructions in the app, add the ingredients when prompted and, hey presto, you can call yourself a brewer.

In 2014, Brewbot was accepted into the Techstars program in Austin, TX.

Articles


  • Moving on from Brewbot · 19 Jun 2014

    • It's been an amazing year working with Brewbot as a Product Design Intern, but it's time for me to move on. Over the past year I've had the chance to work on an amazing product with a very talented group of people. It's been a wonderful experience that I'm eternally grateful for.

  • Brewing Coffee · 02 Jun 2014

    • I started drinking coffee at a very young age but It wasn't until last year that my interest in coffee really started to grow. The level of complexity in such a simple drink became fascinating to me and I wanted to learn a lot more about it.
